data.title: Perfect lil escape from the norm!
data.text: Great lil cake shop! Decently priced, and the choices change quite often, keeping things fresh and new. Havent had a bad experience out there at all!

data.title: A great find!
data.text: This is a gem! It is a huge storefront but not a bakery with a huge selection...not a typical bakery. But the cupcakes and other selections are wonderful.  Try them all!  There were about 10 types of cupcakes and other types of cookies and brownies but much. They specialize in fancy pre ordered cakes. Not cheap but worth it for a treat. Well worth visiting but check their hours

data.title: Great Cupcakes
data.text: Purchased 24 cupcakes with no gluten and less sugar for a family member who is on a low sodium diet.  We discussed making it as low-calorie as possible. They did as I asked.  I was able to freeze them for later as needed.  Cupcake was delicious. I felt the price was a little high, but maybe not because of the constraints.  They have lovely decorated goodies there.  I will make other purchases there....especially for special occasions.

data.title: Great Cupcakes!
data.text: I decided I needed something different for desert, so I stopped into this very nice little shop that is located in front of the Lawton Central Mall. They had about 20 different kinds of homemade cupcakes and everything was decorated so nicely . The lady behind the counter was very nice and attentive. I love little shops that pay attention to detail. It is a shame that there are not more of these places. Chains are taking over and ruining the restaurant experience. Food and service was great. I will be back.

data.title: Best of Oklahoma Cupcakes
data.text:
This place has awesome cupcakes, especially the ones filled with Gnache, I hope I spelled that right, but it basically tastes like a creamier frosting. :)
I have tried others around Oklahoma City and these are far better.  The frosting doesn't leave that residue or aftertaste that others I have tried did.  Also, they are super moist and you can tell baked from scratch.  I never tried the cake pops so I can't say how those are.  Only bummer is this place was closed on Mondays and Tuesday, last time I there anyhow, perhaps its changed.  Its across from the small and only mall in town. Oh, my daughter went to a cupcake decorating party their and loved it.  I think they would do well selling items like a boutique does as they have the room.  I only gave 4 stars for atmosphere as its a little bare but perhaps they will add more as time goes along.
